game.title: Crownborn: Shattered Lineage
currency.name: Skycrowns
power.sanctum_ward_revive_once_per_stage: Sanctum Ward (revive once per stage if unused)
shaman.line.001: Power without purpose is a candle in storm—shield your flame.
shaman.line.002: When wolves circle, become the wind, not the tree.
shaman.line.003: Every fortress has a forgotten vein; feel for its pulse.
shaman.line.004: Listen for lies in the quiet between war drums.
shaman.line.005: Mercy is a blade—wield it or sheath it with intent.
shaman.line.006: The sky carries you if you leap with wisdom.
shaman.line.007: Your blood remembers thrones; let your heart remember people.
shaman.line.008: A map shows walls; breath finds doors.
shaman.line.009: Count the steps of your fear, then step once more.
shaman.line.010: Even giants drown in inches of truth.
cinematic.quote.04: Every fortress has a forgotten vein; feel for its pulse.
cinematic.quote.05: Count the steps of your fear, then step once more.
cinematic.quote.06: Your blood remembers thrones; let your heart remember people.
cinematic.quote.07: They took them when the rain began. I counted the lanterns. I counted my breath. I ran.
cinematic.quote.08: Maps are not walls. They are **doors** you have not opened yet.
cinematic.quote.09: I could have ended him. I chose the oath instead. My hands wouldn’t stop shaking.
cinematic.quote.10: A crown is a promise that outlives us. Mind the promise.
